issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC009976.4 and AC095380.1 of GRCh37
issue.description: There is a Type 2 gap between components AC009976.4 and AC095380.1
issue.resolution_text: AC009976.4 and AC095380.1 overlap by restriction site. HuRef WGS sequence ABBA01017229.1 overlaps the join boundary, confirming this overlap. BAC AC095380 and PCR product AC095380 overlap by restriction site (as confirmed by the sequence of other palindrome P5 arm).

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC079261.2 and AC079156.4 of GRCh37
issue.status_text: Currently looking for sequence to span this gap.
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC079261.2 and AC079156.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC068123.5 may be incorrectly oriented
issue.description: Component AC068123.5 may be incorrectly oriented within the chromosome sequence.
issue.resolution_text: The orientation of AC068123 has been set to 'minus' in the Chr. Y TPF.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC079126.3 and AC079125.4 of GRCh37.
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence to extend off of these components. In GRCh38, WGS sequences ABBA01060289.1, ABBA01031656.1, ABBA01031655.1 and ABBA01031654.1 have been added to this gap and are now present in NC_000024.10.
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC079126.3 and AC079125.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC006158.6 and AC006156.5 of GRCh37.
issue.status_text: We are currently looking for sequence to span this gap.
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC006158.6 and AC006156.5
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC069323.5 and AC140113.3 of GRCh37.
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence to extend off of these components. The following WGS components were added to this gap for GRCh38 (NC_000024.10): AUXG01000678.1, AUXG01000677.1, AUXG01000676.1, AUXG01000675.1, AUXG01000674.1, AUXG01000673.1, AUXG01000408.1, AUXG01000409.1, AUXG01000410.1, AUXG01000411.1, AUXG01000412.1, AUXG01000413.1, AUXG01000414.1, AUXG01000415.1, AUXG01000416.1, AUXG01000417.1, AUXG01000418.1, AUXG01000419.1, AUXG01000420.1, AUXG01000421.1, AUXG01000422.1, AUXG01000423.1, AUXG01000424.1, AUXG01000425.1, AUXG01000426.1, AUXG01000427.1 and AUXG01000428.1
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC069323.5 and AC140113.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC134879.3 and AC011293.5 of GRCh37.
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence to extend off of these components. The following WGS components were added to this gap for GRCh38 (NC_000024.10): ABBA01065757.1, ABBA01065756.1, ABBA01065755.1, ABBA01065754.1, ABBA01065753.1, ABBA01065752.1, ABBA01065751.1 and ABBA01065750.1
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC134879.3 and AC011293.5

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC021107.3 and AC078938.3 of GRCh37.
issue.status_text: Currently looking for sequence to span this gap. The following WGS sequences were added for GRCh38 (NC_000024.10): ABBA01049570.1, ABBA01049571.1, ABBA01049572.1 and AUXG01000496.1.
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC021107.3 and AC078938.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GRCh37 (NC_000024.9) contains a stretch of 9 components that are composed of multiple libraries in the AZFa region on Chromosome Y
issue.description: Chromosome Y (GRCh37: NC_000024.9) has a stretch of 9 components that are from multiple libraries/non-RP11 clones in the AZFa region.
issue.resolution_text: Newly sequenced RPCI-11 pathway has been added to the Chrom. Y TPF, giving a single-haplotype representation of the AZFa region of Chr. Y.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between the telomere and PAR region component BX640545.2 of Chrom. Y
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between the telomere and PAR region component BX640545.2 of Chrom. Y
issue.resolution_text: BX640545.2 contains approximately 33bp of telomeric repeat on its end, this is confirmed by Harold Riethman's human telomere analysis (GSOFT-22).

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234578.5 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: 1K-Genomes decoy sequence AC234578.5 is not currently in the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: 1K-Genomes decoy sequence AC234578.5 (ABC8-40863300G1) has been added to the Chr. Y unlocalized TPF for inclusion in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Chr. Y accession AC236424.3 (ABC8-785722D2) contains 9,037bp of sequence not present in the Reference.
issue.description: AC002992.1 (203M13) contains 9,037bp of sequence not present in the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: RP11-91N9 from a previously reported RP11 TPF (HG-1536) is now submitted, representing the sequence missing from GRCh37 but found in AC236424.3 (ABC8-785722D2)

issue.summary: Full insert for clipped GRCh38 component AC024250.6 needs finished and re-submitted.
issue.status_text: Current sequencing technologies here at MGI do not allow us to re-sequence RP11-684N2 to any level of accuracy suitable for the Reference Assembly.
issue.description: The full insert for clipped GRCh38 component AC024250.6 (RP11-684N2) needs finished and re-submitted.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible gap extending clone
issue.description: GRCh38 component AC025226.4, currently adjacent to an assembly gap, may have an alignment to GQ222230.1 on its proximal end.
issue.resolution_text: Both GQ222230.1 (LL0YNC03-8A12) and GQ222231.1 (ABC8-41143400G2) have been added to both the Chr. Y primary TPF and the Chr. Y patches TPF.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000024.10: 222976 (R), 222980 (S), 222990 (W), 222582 (Y) and 222863 (Y) in component AEKP01217652.1.
issue.resolution_text: WGS component AEKP01217652.1, which contains the ambiguous bases, was actually mis-placed in GRCh38. It's true alignment is to BX640545.2, which is a telomeric component. Since AEKP01217652.1 only adds a few extra copies of a telomeric repeat, it will be removed completely from the Chr. X TPF PAR region.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC007876.2
issue.status_text: We plan to have RP11-65G9 re-sequenced with Miseq data
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC007876.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC068123.5 and AC025226.4 in GRCh37.
issue.status_text: We are currently looking for sequence to span this gap.
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC068123.5 and AC025226.4 in GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC073880.5 and AC068123.5 in GRCh38 (NC_000024.10)
issue.status_text: Looking for sequence to add to this gap.
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC073880.5 and AC068123.5 in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Clone overlap incorrect, expected to be around 100kb
issue.status_text: We plan to have RP11-292P9 re-sequenced with Miseq data
issue.description: The clone overlap between AC006370.2 and AC018677.3 appears to be incorrect. It is expected to be ~100kb
issue.resolution_text: Issue reported takes into account the clipped version of RP11-264A13 (AC018677.3), which does only overlap it's neighbor (AC006370.2) by 200bp. The full insert of RP11-264A13 does overlap AC006370.2 by ~75kb. This was also confirmed by optical map data from both GM10860 and GM18994.

issue.summary: Alignment of AC022486.4 and AC007379.2 is inconsistent with contig building
issue.description: Alignment of AC022486.4 and AC007379.2 is inconsistent with contig building
issue.resolution_text: Correct alignment uploaded to the database.

issue.summary: No alignment between AC079261.2 and AC079156.4
issue.description: No alignment between components AC079261.2 and AC079156.4
issue.resolution_text: A Type-2 gap was placed between components AC079261.2 and AC079156.4 in preparation for GRCh37.

issue.summary: No alignment between components AC024250.6 and AC009240.6
issue.description: No alignment between components AC024250.6 and AC009240.6
issue.resolution_text: Blunt join exists for this pair. Certificate submitted.

issue.summary: Alignment between AC009976.4 and AC095380.1 inconsistent with contig building
issue.description: Alignment between components AC009976.4 and AC095380.1 is inconsistent with contig
issue.resolution_text: A gap has been placed between Reference components AC009976.4 and AC095380.1 in the Chrom. Y TPF.

issue.summary: Add type-3 gap to beginning of chr. Y TPF
issue.description: Missing gap on chr. Y TPF makes short arm PAR region on chr. Y appear smaller than equivalent region on chr. X
issue.resolution_text: TPF has been updated to include GAP.
